description: This file defines a React functional component named LeftSidebar. The component renders a sidebar with an element palette for categories such as Plants, Trees, Flowers, etc., and a Quick Add section. It makes use of a Card component for layout and styling. The component is meant for inclusion in a larger React application, likely as part of a frontend UI for a garden designing tool.

methods.name: LeftSidebar()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the sidebar with categories and quick add info.
